command.notConnected: You cannot use this feature because you are not on MoneyMaker.

timer.usage: Please use /mm-timer <Time in minutes> <name of the timer>
timer.no-number: <Time in minutes> must be a number.
timer.max-length: The timer name can be a maximum of %s characters long.
timer.already-exists: A timer with this name already exists.
timer.performance: Please note that the more timers you create, the performance loss may occur.
timer.created: The timer %s with %s minutes has been created.

reset.booster: Your saved booster data has been reset
reset.miners: Your saved miner data has been reset.
reset.debris: Your saved debris data has been reset.
reset.all: All saved data has been reset.

text.no-fetch-name: The name for %s could not be retrieved.
text.new-update: §aA new addon update is available. §7The update will install when you close the game.

booster-export.title: Booster-Export
booster-export.no-boosters: There are no boosters to export.
booster-export.saved: The overview of your farmed boosters has been saved.

chat.title: Addon-Chat
chat.connected: Successfully connected to the chat server.
chat.no-connection: Unable to connect to the chat server.

left.title: Leave farming cave
left.reset-question: Do you want to reset the block, kill and booster counters?
left.reset: Your block, kill and booster counters have been reset.

break-goal.title: Break Goal
break-goal.text: You have reached your break goal!
break-goal.set: You have set your break goal to %s blocks.
break-goal.no-number: Please enter a number as input.

miner.title: Money for workers reached!
miner.text: You have reached the money for the next miner.

debris.title: Money for debris reached!
debris.text: You have reached the money to remove the debris.

hideEmptyMessages.name: Hide Empty Messages
hideEmptyMessages.description: Hides empty messages and divider messages

notifyOnMoneyReached.name: Notification when money for workers/debris reached

showTimersOnEffect.name: Show clickable timers in chat
showTimersOnEffect.description: Displays a clickable message in chat to activate a timer when a worker's effect activates.

showLocation.name: Show current Location
showLocation.description: Shows your current Location (Mine or Farming cave)

showStats.name: Show Statistics
showStats.description:
Shows your statistics

Mine: Balance, Worker count, Ranking

Farming cave: Broken Blocks, Farmed Boosters, Pickaxe Rank & Level, Ranking

notification.name: Notifications
notification.description: Receive notification of new messages via the addon chat

notificationSound.name: Notification sound
notificationSound.description: Receive a notification sound for new messages via the addon chat

break-goal.title: Break Goal
break-goal.description: Should the break goal function be activated?
break-goal.input-description: Enter the break goal you want to achieve.

info.title: MoneyMaker Information
info.commands:
§b/mm-timer <Minutes> <Timer Name> §6Creates a timer
§b/mm-reset <booster, miners, debris, all> §6Reset the collected data

chat.title: MoneyMaker Addon Chat
chat.server-offline: The chat server is currently not available.

muted.title: You have been muted from the chat.
